Description:
Clean and supply designated facility areas.
Perform various cleaning actions such as dusting, sweeping, vacuuming, mopping, cleaning ceiling vents, restroom cleaning, etc.
Perform and track routine inspections.
Perform and track maintenance activities.
Serve refreshments when necessary.Skills
Skills:
Works with minimum supervision.
Hardworking, honest, and responsible.
Ability to work quickly and methodically.
Ability to concentrate while doing repetitive tasks.
Willingness to work flexibly.
Team Player
Clean and presentable
